properties.areaDesc: Lincoln; Jones; Jefferson Davis; Jefferson; Covington; Lawrence
properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 19 at 8:12PM CST until February 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING...

The National Weather Service in Jackson has expanded the

* Flash Flood Watch to include portions of south central
Mississippi, southeast Mississippi and southwest Mississippi,
including the following areas in south central Mississippi,
Jefferson Davis, Lawrence and Lincoln. In southeast
Mississippi, Covington and Jones. In southwest Mississippi,
Jefferson.

* Through Thursday morning

* Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts
in a short amount of time is likely.

* Ongoing river flooding may be worsened.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should flash flood warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
